key.name: all-workspaces
key.description: If enabled, windows from all workspaces will be displayed in the alt-tab-switcher. Otherwise, only windows from the current workspace will be shown.

key.name: animate
key.summary: Animate the open and start of the switcher
key.description: Fade the switcher in and out and animate its depth when it is opened and closed.

key.name: always-on-primary-monitor
key.summary: Always place the switcher on the primary monitor
key.description: When enabled the switcher will always appear on the primary monitor. Otherwise it will be placed on the current monitor, that is, the monitor with the cursor on it.

key.name: icon-size
key.description: The size at which the icons in the switcher should be displayed.
